description: Multi-indicator strategy combining ADX trend strength, Bollinger Bands, RSI, Stochastic, and MFI for comprehensive market analysis with trailing stop.
author: Gert Wohlgemuth

populate_indicators.description: Calculate comprehensive set of technical indicators for trend, momentum, and volatility analysis
populate_indicators.pseudocode:
1. Calculate ADX with period 14
2. Calculate RSI with period 14
3. Calculate Bollinger Bands (20, 2)
4. Calculate Stochastic Fast (FastK, FastD)
5. Calculate MFI (Money Flow Index)
6. Calculate SAR (Parabolic Stop and Reverse)

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: pandas DataFrame with columns: open, high, low, close, volume

populate_indicators.output_description: DataFrame with indicators: adx, rsi, bb_lowerband, bb_middleband, bb_upperband, fastd, fastk, mfi, sar
populate_indicators.logic_explanation: Combines trend strength (ADX), momentum (RSI, Stochastic), volatility (Bollinger Bands), and money flow (MFI) for comprehensive analysis.

populate_buy_trend.description: Generate buy signals using ADX strength, Stochastic oversold, and Bollinger Band support
populate_buy_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX > 47 (strong trend required)
2. Check FastD < 41 (oversold condition)
3. Check close < bb_lowerband (price below lower band)
4. If all conditions true, set buy = 1
populate_buy_trend.output_description: DataFrame with buy column indicating buy signals (1 = buy, 0 = no action)
populate_buy_trend.logic_explanation: Looks for oversold bounces in strong trending markets when price touches lower Bollinger Band support.

populate_sell_trend.description: Generate sell signals using ADX strength, MFI overbought, and Stochastic conditions
populate_sell_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX > 67 (very strong trend)
2. Check MFI > 97 (extreme overbought money flow)
3. Check FastD < 74 (stochastic condition)
4. If all conditions true, set sell = 1
populate_sell_trend.output_description: DataFrame with sell column indicating sell signals (1 = sell, 0 = no action)
populate_sell_trend.logic_explanation: Identifies extreme overbought conditions in very strong trends when money flow reaches extreme levels.

indicators.name: ADX
indicators.description: Average Directional Index - measures trend strength

indicators.name: Stochastic Fast
indicators.description: Fast Stochastic oscillator for overbought/oversold conditions

indicators.name: MFI
indicators.description: Money Flow Index - volume-weighted momentum indicator

indicators.name: SAR
indicators.description: Parabolic Stop and Reverse - trend following indicator

buy_conditions.description: Strong trend with oversold bounce at Bollinger Band support
buy_conditions.logic: ADX > 47 AND FastD < 41 AND close < bb_lowerband

sell_conditions.description: Extreme overbought conditions in very strong trend
